price: (Àmì tún wà) lára ìjọ ‘Ād. (Rántí) nígbà tí A rán atẹ́gùn ìparun sí wọn.
arabic: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلۡعَقِيمَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wafī ʿādin idh arsalnā ʿalayhimu al-rīḥa al-ʿaqīma
